name: Creating a Personal Website (Headings & P)
objective: Design a personal website using only headings and paragraphs to introduce yourself, your interests, and your experiences. This assignment aims to help you practice structuring content with basic HTML elements.

questoins: Create project directory and call it "MyWebsite" and open it with VSCode
Create a new HTML file named "index.html"
Begin with the standard HTML document structure.
Use an h1 heading for the title of your website, such as "Welcome to My World"
Use an h2 heading titled "About Me"
Write a paragraph (p) introducing yourself, including your name, background, and interests.
Write a paragraph detailing your educational background, including your current school or alma mater.
Use an h2 heading titled "Work Experience"
Write a paragraph summarizing your work experience, including any relevant internships or part-time jobs.
Write a paragraph listing your skills or areas of expertise, such as programming languages, software, or hobbies.
Write a paragraph describing your interests outside of work or school, such as sports, music, or travel.
Use an h2 heading titled "Future Goals".
Write a paragraph outlining your aspirations and future plans, whether it's related to your career or personal development.
